attributes.action: Replace First-Past-The-Post with Single Transferrable Vote & Alternative Vote
attributes.background: We urge the Government to abolish First-Past-The-Post (FPTP) for all elections. We would like the Government to replace it with Single Transferrable Vote for General and Council elections, and Alternative Vote for mayoral and by-elections.
